thread.section_title: OLDIES.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OLDIES.com | oldies.com | 3 of 400
thread.title: Delicia Ambrosino

author: Delicia Ambrosino
title: Delicia Ambrosino
text:
Purchase price is great on many items. Some items still exceedingly high priced {generally the most wanted items-even DVD oldies that are still extremely well liked such as The Addams Family or Tarzan with Johnny Weissmuller, among many others}. Memoirs was a fantastic price. One suggestion. It would be helpful to note in descriptions what region the DVD's can be played in.
Even so I really like Oldies.com and highly recommend them to everyone. Their selection is above everyone else's and there is ALWAYS something for everyone.
